error_details.explanation: Incomplete calculation. The candies that Lana ate (3) should also be added to the total- Nellie, Jacob and Lana together ate 12+6+3=21 candies.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 4
Jacob can eat 12 / 2 = <<12/2=6>>6 candies before crying.
Lana can eat 6 - 3 = <<6-3=3>>3 candies before crying.
Nellie and Jacob ate until they cried, so they ate 12 + 6 = <<12+6=18>>18 candies.
Thus, there are 30 - 18 = <<30-18=12>>12 candies left in the bucket.
After dividing the remaining candies equally, they will each get 12 / 3 = <<12/3=4>>4 sourball candies.
